span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 使充满勇气和力量，使振作： to fill with courage or strength of purpose
【例】 the sudden improvement in his health buoyed him up 身体的突然好转让他很振奋
【近】 embolden, hearten, inspire, bear up, buck up
【反】 daunt, discourage, dishearten, dispirit 使沮丧，泼冷水

【记】 boy 男生总是积极向上，沉不下去,象救生圈一样压不到水底里,受到打击也能很快恢复
